column4: does anyone have any experiece upgrading from 9.04 to 9.10?  What should I be warry of?
have you got lots of customizations?
(non-standard packages, software you compiled yourself, ...)
no, it's a fresh install AFIK... from netbook
I upgraded my 9.04 to 9.10 fine on my netbook
were you using a customized dist or ubuntu eee/easypeasy
just ubuntu netbook remix
which is just ubuntu with less packages :)
how different is it from eeebuntu?
can't tell. As far as I know, eeebuntu relies on scripts heavily to get stuff done. On ubuntu 9.10 most of the eee functionality works out of the box on my machine (1005HA)
which I realized after answering your initial q's, is what is on here
OOTB is why I'm doing it...
don't know how it works for eeebuntu
don't know you can upgrade from eeebuntu -> karmic 9.10
we shal see soon!
good luck. Sorry, but I don't know a lot about eeebuntu. It's not an official ubuntu derivative, so I don't know how it organises things :)
i'm only doing it because ubuntu studion iso wouldnt install... it kept peeing on my shoes
hehe :)
well, ubuntu studio isn't an official derivate either :)
it's official enough
Do you know a quick way to check the dist/version of the system?
uname -a ?
wow... i feel... new...
you're welcome :)
